title: Keen Senses
content:
Keen Senses Effect You have Proficiency in the Perception skill. Requirements Elf

You have Proficiency in the Perception skill.

Keen Senses is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.

Keen Senses Information

You have Proficiency in the Perception skill.

How to unlock Keen Senses

Keen Senses can be acquired by: Elf
